医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
基于网络的自助计划被证明可以有效治疗暴食症研究表明，基于网络的认知行为自助干预措施可以有效减少暴食症（BED）患者的暴食事件并改善其整体健康状况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240519/Web-based-self-help-program-proves- effective-in-treating-binge-eating-disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240519/Web-based-self-help-program-proves- effective-in-treating-binge-eating-disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c654fe85-e1af-4e1f-9ece-d2f570a03a77 Sun, 19 May 2024 22:03:00 -0400 Web-based self-help program proves effective in treating binge eating disorder
英国学校的压力研讨会显着改善青少年的心理健康《柳叶刀》上的 BESST 研究发现，与标准治疗相比，针对英国青少年压力的简短认知行为治疗研讨会在六个月后显示出临床和成本效益。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240519/Stress-workshop-in-UK-schools-significantly-improves-mental-health-of-teenagers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240519/Stress-workshop-in-UK-schools-significantly-improves-mental-health-of-teenagers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2be1a6b2-7884-4f34-9c4f-436549751582 Sun, 19 May 2024 21:49:00 -0400 Stress workshop in UK schools significantly improves mental health of teenagers
研究显示六个国家母亲产后抑郁症的发病率惊人发表在 BMC Public Health 上的研究确定了六个国家母亲产后抑郁症 (PPD) 的患病率、预测因素和应对策略，强调了不同文化和人口背景之间的显着差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240519/Study-reveals-alarming-rates-of-postpartum-depression-among-mothers-in-six-countries.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240519/Study-reveals-alarming-rates-of-postpartum-depression-among-mothers-in-six-countries.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fc977bf2-0d81-482c-83a7-3b6140ca17b9 Sun, 19 May 2024 21:40:00 -0400 Study reveals alarming rates of postpartum depression among mothers in six countries
饮食和营养对寻常痤疮的影响研究强调了某些饮食成分（例如乳制品、巧克力和脂肪）在寻常痤疮发生中的重要作用，并强调需要进一步研究以提供有效的饮食建议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240519/Diet-and-nutritions-influence-on-acne-vulgaris.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240519/Diet-and-nutritions-influence-on-acne-vulgaris.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bb6fb295-1ce5-4b83-93e1-25ff33b40342 Sun, 19 May 2024 21:32:00 -0400 Diet and nutrition's influence on acne vulgaris
抗生素过度使用与医疗机构记录保存不良有关密歇根大学的两位医生及其同事进行的两项新研究表明，诊所和急诊科缺乏详细的记录可能会妨碍减少抗生素的不当使用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Antibiotic-overuse-linked-to-poor-record-keeping-in-healthcare-settings.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Antibiotic-overuse-linked-to-poor-record-keeping-in-healthcare-settings.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7bca25b9-4b1c-4327-a0ae-1840800c7ab0 Fri, 17 May 2024 16:28:00 -0400 Antibiotic overuse linked to poor record-keeping in healthcare settings
儿童 B-ALL 患者商业 CAR-T 疗法的综合成本和利用2024 年 4 月 25 日，《Oncoscience》（第 11 卷）发表了一篇新的社论论文，题为“希望的代价：儿科白血病的 CAR-T 疗法”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Compressive-cost-and-utilization-of-commercial-CAR-T-therapy-in-pediatric-B-ALL-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Compressive-cost-and-utilization-of-commercial-CAR-T-therapy-in-pediatric-B-ALL-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=96bf97ae-d072-4776-8e81-691628fd221d Fri, 17 May 2024 16:05:00 -0400 Comprehensive cost and utilization of commercial CAR-T therapy in pediatric B-ALL patients
莫内尔研究揭示哺乳动物甜味受体在调节血糖水平中的双重作用莫内尔化学感官中心关于甜味的丰富研究组合可以追溯到很久以前：莫内尔科学家是 2001 年发现并描述哺乳动物甜味受体 TAS1R2-TAS1R3 的四个团队之一。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Monell-study-uncovers-dual-role-of-mammalian-sweet-taste-receptor-in-regulate-blood-sugar-levels.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Monell-study-uncovers-dual-role-of-mammalian-sweet-taste-receptor-in-regulate-blood-sugar-levels.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=03f47f43-32ae-4695-b67e-89caabe37aa3 Fri, 17 May 2024 15:58:00 -0400 Monell study uncovers dual role of mammalian sweet taste receptor in regulating blood sugar levels
研究证实强大的屏障可防止慢性消耗性疾病传播给人类一项使用人类大脑类器官模型进行朊病毒疾病的新研究表明，存在着巨大的物种屏障，可以阻止慢性消耗性疾病（CWD）从鹿、麋鹿和驼鹿传播给人类。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Study-confirms-strong-barrier-preventing-chronic-wasting-disease-transmission-to- humans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Study-confirms-strong-barrier-preventing-chronic-wasting-disease-transmission-to- humans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fe57fe6d-fa6d-46c7-817d-cb19b4127571 Fri, 17 May 2024 15:50:00 -0400 Study confirms strong barrier preventing chronic wasting disease transmission to humans
MGH 研究人员使用新药挽救免疫性血栓性血小板减少性紫癜患者的生命由麻省总医院（麻省总医院布里格姆医疗系统的创始成员）的研究人员领导的团队使用一种新药挽救了一名免疫性血栓性血小板减少性紫癜（iTTP）患者的生命，这是一种罕见的疾病，其特征是整个过程中凝血不受控制。小血管。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/MGH-investigators-use-new-drug-to-save-the-life-of-病人-with-immune-thrombotic-thrombocytopenic-purpura.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/MGH-investigators-use-new-drug-to-save-the-life-of-病人-with-immune-thrombotic-thrombocytopenic-purpura.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3f4b6473-2b50-42d6-acc1-976bd4faf9fe Fri, 17 May 2024 15:43:00 -0400 MGH investigators use new drug to save the life of patient with immune thrombotic thrombocytopenic purpura
肠道细菌疣状瘤胃球菌可以增强癌症免疫治疗的效果大约五分之一的癌症患者受益于免疫疗法——一种利用免疫系统对抗癌症的治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Gut-bacteria-Ruminococcus-gnavus-can-enhance-the-effects-of-cancer-immunotherapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Gut-bacteria-Ruminococcus-gnavus-can-enhance-the-effects-of-cancer-immunotherapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=231d41b3-ddc8-45e3-a827-4d6f7e616c68 Fri, 17 May 2024 14:53:00 -0400 Gut bacteria Ruminococcus gnavus can enhance the effects of cancer immunotherapy
